meta.title: The Most Annoying Website
meta.description: Self-proclaimed most annoying website on the web with so many disgusting features of modern websites you might even vomit at some point.
meta.recruiting: The content of this page is absolutely free for everyone. Heck, you can even access the source code on <linkTag>GitHub</linkTag>. And... You know what? You can even contribute your of stuff as well.

shareModal.title: Share this page
shareModal.description: Spread the misery! Be sure to inflict this painfully obnoxious website on your friends too ‚Äî why suffer alone when you can drag them down with you?

captcha.captchaEmojiHint: Count the emojis and identify which one appears the most. Look carefully, as parts of some emojis might be obscured.
captcha.captchaTilePuzzleHint: Slide the tiles into their right position. You can only move the ones directly next to each other.

experiences.exitPrompt: I'd reconsider leaving before some bad things happend to you. Are you sure?

errors.max: Value must be no more than {{count}}
errors.patternMismatch: The input does not match the required pattern
errors.fileTooLarge: The file size exceeds the limit of {{size}}
errors.missingUppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase letter
errors.missingLowercase: Must contain at least one lowercase letter
errors.missingNumber: Must contain at least one number
errors.missingSpecialCharacter: Must contain at least one symbol
errors.sumOfNumbersGte: Sum of numbers must be at least or equal to {{count}}
errors.sumOfNumbersMustBeEven: Sum of numbers must be be even
